settings_rpc_user_desc.message: Leave it blank unless you have specified

settings_rpc_secret_desc.message: rpc-passwd/rpc-secret or leave it blank if neither is specified.

settings_capture_file_size_desc.message: If enabled, downloading a file with size larger than this value is automatically captured by aria2.

settings_file_types_desc.message: These files are <u>always</u> handled by aria2

settings_site_whitelist_desc.message: Downloads from these site are always handled by aria2, regardless of size or type

settings_site_blacklist_desc.message: Downloads from these site are always ignored by aria2, regardless of size or type

settings_protocol_whitelist_desc.message: Only downloads with these protocols are handled by aria2 based on size or type
